an6.12:1.1: “Chayime, bhikkhave, dhamma saraniya piyakarana garukarana sangahaya avivadaya samaggiya ekibhavaya samvattanti.
an6.12:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno mettam kayakammam paccupatthitam hoti sabrahmacarisu avi ceva raho ca,
an6.12:1.4: ayampi dhammo saraniyo piyakarano garukarano sangahaya avivadaya samaggiya ekibhavaya samvattati.
an6.12:2.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno mettam vacikammam paccupatthitam hoti …pe….
an6.12:3.1: Mettam manokammam paccupatthitam hoti sabrahmacarisu avi ceva raho ca, ayampi dhammo saraniyo piyakarano garukarano sangahaya avivadaya samaggiya ekibhavaya samvattati.
an6.12:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ye te labha dhammika dhammaladdha antamaso pattapariyapannamattampi tatharupehi labhehi appativibhattabhogi hoti silavantehi sabrahmacarihi sadharanabhogi, ayampi dhammo saraniyo piyakarano garukarano sangahaya avivadaya samaggiya ekibhavaya samvattati.
an6.12:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yani tani silani akhandani acchiddani asabalani akammasani bhujissani vinnuppasatthani aparamatthani samadhisamvattanikani tatharupehi silehi silasamannagato viharati sabrahmacarihi avi ceva raho ca, ayampi dhammo saraniyo piyakarano garukarano sangahaya avivadaya samaggiya ekibhavaya samvattati.
an6.12:6.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yayam ditthi ariya niyyanika niyyati takkarassa samma dukkhakkhayaya tatharupaya ditthiya ditthisamannagato viharati sabrahmacarihi avi ceva raho ca,
an6.12:6.2: ayampi dhammo saraniyo piyakarano garukarano sangahaya avivadaya samaggiya ekibhavaya samvattati.
an6.12:7.1: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamma saraniya piyakarana garukarana sangahaya avivadaya samaggiya ekibhavaya samvattanti”ti.
